successes.title: Kingdom Death : Monster
successes.description: Cooperative board game set in a nightmare-horror world. Fight for your life, scavenge, craft, and band together to survive.

Pledges.description: Digital Supporter - Our humble thanks, a digital art book that features concept art, artist bios, and the history of Kingdom Death from inception to production as well as high-resolution images highlighting the artistry of Kingdom Death.

Options Only - If you want to support the project and are only interested in the optional rewards, select this as your base pledge to cover priority shipping. To add any option to your total pledge, simply increase your pledge amount by the value of the options you want. After the campaign, a survey will allow you to confirm your option selections. 
( This also includes the digital artbook! )
Explorer – Digital art book, and the two Kickstarter Exclusive miniatures in plastic, Adam & Anna Explorers of Death!

Resin Explorer – In addition to rewards at the $30 level, you'll also receive the collectors resin versions of Adam and Anna Explorers of Death. These miniatures will be packaged in a hand stamped kraft box, including the character art cards & a 6"x4" matte print of the full artwork, and a numbered certificate of authenticity.
Black Friday Launch Special! - The Game – At this level, you’ll receive the Kingdom Death: Monster boxed game! You will also receive the digital art book.
Black Friday Launch Special Round 2! - The Game – At this level, you’ll receive the Kingdom Death: Monster boxed game! You will also receive the digital art book.
The Game – At this level, you’ll receive the Kingdom Death: Monster boxed game!  You will also receive the digital art book.

Black Friday Launch Special - Survivor – You’ll receive the Kingdom Death: Monster boxed game, the two Kickstarter exclusive plastic miniatures Adam & Anna Explorers of Death, the Kingdom Death t-shirt, and the digital art book.

Black Friday Launch Special Round 2- Survivor – You’ll receive the Kingdom Death: Monster boxed game, the two Kickstarter exclusive plastic miniatures Adam & Anna Explorers of Death, the Kingdom Death t-shirt, and the digital art book.

Black Friday Launch Special Round 3! - Survivor – You’ll receive the Kingdom Death: Monster boxed game, the two Kickstarter exclusive plastic miniatures Adam & Anna Explorers of Death, the Kingdom Death t-shirt, and the digital art book.

Black Friday Launch Special Round 4! - Survivor – You’ll receive the Kingdom Death: Monster boxed game, the two Kickstarter exclusive plastic miniatures Adam & Anna Explorers of Death, the Kingdom Death t-shirt, and the digital art book.

Black Friday Launch Special Round 5! - Survivor – You’ll receive the Kingdom Death: Monster boxed game, the two Kickstarter exclusive plastic miniatures Adam & Anna Explorers of Death, the Kingdom Death t-shirt, and the digital art book.

Black Friday Launch Special Round 6! - Survivor – You’ll receive the Kingdom Death: Monster boxed game, the two Kickstarter exclusive plastic miniatures Adam & Anna Explorers of Death, the Kingdom Death t-shirt, and the digital art book.
Survivor – You’ll receive the Kingdom Death: Monster boxed game, the two Kickstarter exclusive plastic miniatures Adam & Anna Explorers of Death, the Kingdom Death t-shirt, and the digital art book.

Black Friday Launch Special - Deluxe Survivor – You’ll receive all rewards at the $155 level and the collectors resin version of the Adam and Anna Explorer of Death miniatures included in the $70 level. You’ll also receive a collectors resin version of the four starting survivor miniatures.

Black Friday Launch Special - Deluxe Survivor Round 2 – You’ll receive all rewards at the $155 level and the collectors resin version of the Adam and Anna Explorer of Death miniatures included in the $70 level. You’ll also receive a collectors resin version of the four starting survivor miniatures.

Black Friday Launch Special - Deluxe Survivor Round 3 – You’ll receive all rewards at the $155 level and the collectors resin version of the Adam and Anna Explorer of Death miniatures included in the $70 level. You’ll also receive a collectors resin version of the four starting survivor miniatures.

Deluxe Survivor – You’ll receive all rewards at the $155 level and the collectors resin version of the Adam and Anna Explorer of Death miniatures included in the $70 level.  You’ll also receive a collectors resin version of the four starting survivor miniatures.
Black Friday Launch Special - 3 x Survivor – You’ll receive 3 copies of the $155 pledge level. Just for Matt Aslin!
Black Friday Launch Special Final Round - 3 x Survivor – You’ll receive 3 copies of the $155 pledge level. Requested by Jeffrey!
3 x Survivor – You’ll receive 3 copies of the $155 pledge level.

All Resin Beta - Black Friday Madness ( i can't afford to put up any more of these, please don't ask! ) – You’ll receive the Collectors Resin Edition, which includes the private beta rules, the Adam and Anna Explorers of Death in resin. Add +$100 to also receive the rewards from the Survivor pledge level.

All Resin Beta –  You’ll receive the Collectors Resin Edition, which includes the private beta rules, the Adam and Anna Explorers of Death in resin.  Add +$100 to also receive the rewards from the Survivor pledge level.

Patron of the Arts - A special death scene for each of the 4 starting survivors is being commissioned for the game. In addition to the rewards from Deluxe Survivor, you will also receive a limited set of all 4 pieces of art, printed on high quality archival paper matted and framed. Each set is also numbered and signed for authenticity.

Explorer of Death - Rewards from Deluxe Survivor  + We will sculpt a unique survivor head for you and upgrade the game with it. The artwork and a credit will be included in the rulebook. Along with a short story about how your survivor died. We will also make a hunt or settlement event in your honor.

King of Death - Get the rewards from the Deluxe Survivor  + a special production run of every miniature we produce, including sold out miniatures on the webstore and new miniatures from this kick starters stretch goals. I would suggest getting an ikea glass cabinet to show of your collection!
